patterns: I would like to cancel order
I dont want to order this food
response: Your order has been cancelled sucessfully, would you mind to tell us why you want to cancel order?

Order confirmed!!! Thank you and have a nice day!
We started with one goal in mind: to be the most convenient food delivery service in the country
We link you to the vendors for you to order a variety of prepared meals.

patterns: Ensure safety and success during contactless delivery
response: To ensure safety measures, all delivery drivers are required to wear safety equipment when dropping off an order at its destination. This includes: 1. Wearing gloves. 2. Wearing a face mask that covers mouth and nose. 3. Regular sanitize delivery trucks. 4. Do temperature checks of all delivery employees before starting and at the end of their shift.
